Container.Name: homescreen-hero
Container.Overview:
A self-hosted web app that keeps your Plex home screen fresh by automatically rotating collections (scheduled or manual) via a modern FastAPI + React dashboard.
Features: - First-Time Setup Wizard for easy configuration - Automated Plex Collection Rotation on customizable schedules - Intuitive Web Dashboard for managing collections - 3rd Party Integrations (Trakt lists for IMDb, TMDb, TVDb) - Flexible YAML-based or Web UI configuration - Built specifically for Plex Media Server
Setup can either be configured in environment variables below, or skipped and setup in the web UI after first launch.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the web interface

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Directory for config.yaml, database, and logs

Config.Name: Plex Token
Config.Description: Your Plex authentication token (required - find at: https://support.plex.tv/articles/204059436-finding-an-authentication-token-x-plex-token/)

Config.Name: Auth Password
Config.Description: Password for web UI authentication (optional but recommended)

Config.Name: Auth Secret Key
Config.Description: JWT secret key for authentication (use website or generate with: openssl rand -hex 32)

Config.Name: Trakt Client ID
Config.Description: Trakt API client ID for third-party list integration (optional - get at: https://trakt.tv/oauth/applications)

Config.Name: Config File Path
Config.Description: Path to config file (default is recommended)

Config.Name: Log Directory
Config.Description: Directory for application logs (default is recommended)
